name: So You Think You Can Renegade
name_original: So You Think You Can Renegade
description:
Created for the Interactive Narrative assignment in the Narrative and Dynamic Systems class at Parsons the New School

This is the mind of a upper 20-something trying to do the Renegade for the first time after seeing it so many times. The Dance? Only 15 seconds long. Should be easy. After all, the kids are all doing it. Don't let it flop. #fyp #featureme #renegade #sonicspeedmeup #epsteindidntkillhimself #2020election #music #mylifeinphotos

Click the screen to play.

Made with Fungus.

Song is Lottery by K Camp

Original Renegade Dance by Jalaiah Harmon
